comment: # барка когда чек на скилл (Awareness) прошел и поск демона дал некоторую подсказку про него

languages.text: За спиной нарастает злобное визгливое хихиканье. Однако за вами никого нет...

traits.locale_text: За спиной нарастает злобное визгливое хихиканье. Однако за вами никого нет...

languages.text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...
languages.original_text: За спиной нарастает злобное визгливое хихиканье. Однако за вами никого нет...

traits.locale_text: Baleful giggling behind you is turning into a shriek of delight. But there is no one around...
Baleful giggling behind you is turning into a shriek of delight. But there is no one around...
Baleful giggling behind you turns into a shriek of delight. But there is no one there...
Baleful giggling behind you turns into a shriek of delight. But there is no one there...
You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

languages.text: 你听到身后传来尖锐、恐怖的笑声，而且声音越来越大，但你身后一个人都没有……
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

traits.locale_text: 你听到身后传来尖锐、恐怖的笑声，而且声音越来越大，但你身后一个人都没有……

languages.text: Oyes una risa estridente y maligna que surge desde detrás de ti que cada vez es más fuerte. Pero no tienes a nadie detrás...
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

traits.locale_text: Oyes una risa estridente y maligna que surge desde detrás de ti que cada vez es más fuerte. Pero no tienes a nadie detrás...

languages.text: 背後から甲高い不気味な笑い声が聞こえ、だんだん迫ってくる。しかしそこには誰もいない…
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

traits.locale_text: 背後から甲高い不気味な笑い声が聞こえ、だんだん迫ってくる。しかしそこには誰もいない…

languages.text: Hinter dir erklingt ein schrilles, unheilvolles Kichern, und es wird lauter. Aber da ist niemand ...
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

traits.locale_text: Hinter dir erklingt ein schrilles, unheilvolles Kichern, und es wird lauter. Aber da ist niemand ...

languages.text: Vous entendez des ricanements aigus et malveillants derrière vous. Ils se font de plus en plus forts, mais personne ne vient...
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...

traits.locale_text: Vous entendez des ricanements aigus et malveillants derrière vous. Ils se font de plus en plus forts, mais personne ne vient...

languages.text: Arkandan gelen birtakım tiz, uğursuz kıkırtılar duyuyorsun. Ses gitgide yükseliyor. Oysa orada kimsecikler yok...
languages.original_text: You hear shrill, baleful giggling coming from behind you, and it is getting louder. But there is no one there...
